summary: A byte-datum is a literal byte value.
details: Return the value of the constant.
static-checks: The value must be inclusively between the minimum and maximum.
example-1: module Main in examples;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val value = 23B + -5B + 1B;%0A%0A    F::println(value);%0A}
